about_the_game:
Get ready for an unforgettable finale with the second DLC for Fetish Locator Week 3! This DLC includes the last 6 endings out of 18 possible, wrapping up the legendary trilogy. Each ending lasts an hour and is packed with sizzling content that will satisfy your deepest fetishes and desires. Expect BDSM hookups, dominating mistresses, girls playing the role of pets, dates with a surprise under the skirt, and stunning beauties ready to fulfill your every whim. Every story has been crafted to give you a thrilling and sensual odyssey with your favorite (or favorites).

Ending 16 - "Breeding Ponies"

This ending with Jessie sees MC from the city to the farm to take care of the place after Jessie's relative leaves the farm to her. Naturally, what seems like a chance to start a new life quickly gets a bit kinky when Jessie and MC learn the secret about the farm. The place turns out to be the perfect refuge for a whole bunch of amazing animal girls, each of whom will require plenty of attention and care by the new farmer. Beyond Jessie and these new animal girls, you'll even get a special visit from Kanya for some extra spice. Get ready for a rustic life full of many kinky opportunities on the farm with the best ponygirl by your side.

E18 - "The Quartet"

This ending is shaping up to be super intense and steamy! The ending features MC, Dahlia, Samiya, and Pete and covers 7 unique scenes. If you're a Dahlia fan, have no fear, she's ready and willing to go full domination, but we'll also see a new side of Samiya in this ending. And good old Pete will be there to make sure the girls don't crush MC under their boots. So, if you love domination, thrills, and unexpected twists, this ending is going to be right up your alley.

Ending-3: "Two Girls, Two Dicks"

Step into a tale of love and a mysterious cult. In this ending, you, Stacey, and Lyssa will find yourselves facing off against a dangerous conspiracy. It's time to go undercover and under the sheets to discover the cult's secrets. This ending has secrets and twists for you to enjoy with Lyssa and Stacy by your side. Get ready for hot rituals, a daring rescue, and a final twist to open up the next chapter between you and your best girls.

E15 - "Waterfall"

So, Min fans, get ready for some seriously exciting content. Min and MC have set off on a new business venture. The ending will see Stacy checking out what their new spa is all about. The adventure is packed with kinky character interactions and a few new faces for MC to share his wisdom with. As always, expect plenty of hot content showcasing Min's love for "water-based" fun. There is even a special session at the spa with Lyssa if you've had fun with her earlier, along with a few small guest spots if you keep you eyes open.

Ending-9: "Fetish Locator: Rebooted"

Have you ever thought about picking up what Lydia started? Discover a brand new ending where our hero takes control of their destiny. Bringing the Fetish Locator back isn't like flipping on a light bulb. You're going to need to work hard and forge new alliances if you're going to get the new and improved app off the ground. In this ending, you'll see some favorite characters returning to help you launch your dream. It's not going to be easy, but in the end, a new Fetish Locator is definitely worth it.

Ending 5 - "Sausage Party"

This ending is the Lyssa + Oliver story ending. You can expect content featuring the MC + Lyssa + Oliver in various combinations, all with plenty of fetish-filled fun. Sweet Oliver is finally going to get the attention he's been longing for and you and Lyssa are right there to help him get out of his shell. Fans of thrilling experiences in public places or a little hanky-panky in the wild will also find some hot content to enjoy within this ending.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only. The characters depicted in the game are 18 years old of age or older. 

Includes explicit sexual content and behavior some viewers may find offensive or disturbing. Characters engage in oral, vaginal, and anal sex acts, as well as non-penetrative sexual acts. There are scenes of sexual intercourse with pregnant characters. Bondage, sexual domination and submission, pet play, the use of sex toys, bodily fluids, urination, and alternative sexual lifestyles are portrayed.
Strong language is frequently used throughout. Mature themes, such as blackmailing, drugs, and non-consensual sex, are mentioned. The game contains use of alcohol and tobacco. 

The story, characters, names, and actions are fictitious, and any similarity to real life is coincidental and unintended.
